# Installation
> `npm install --save @types/webrtc`

# Summary
This package contains type definitions for webrtc (https://webrtc.org/).

# Details
Files were exported from https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/tree/master/types/webrtc.
